{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Pixie Plate |image = [[File:Pixie_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Pixie Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] [[Berry Master]] }}
==Description== '''Pixie Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine up from the [[Underground]]. They can then be sold for 100 Fairy [[Gems]][[File:Fairy_Gem.png|15px]] or traded for other items in Daily Deals if available that day.
==Details== Its a Plate that can Either sold for 100 Fairy [[Gems]][[File:Fairy_Gem.png|15px]] or used on Daily Deals in the [[Underground]]
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Shards]]
